item.title: House Bill 2010 Printer's Number 3056
item.description: An Act amending Title 20 (Decedents, Estates and Fiduciaries) of the Pennsylvania Consolidated Statutes, providing for training of public pension fund and State fund fiduciaries....
item.parss:coSponsors: GAYDOS, GLEIM, GROVE, JAMES, KAUFFMAN, STAMBAUGH, SAYLOR, LAWRENCE and GILLEN
